Articles.Content:
This is an idea that crossed my mind a while back.

Since the current Kerbalizer 'game' seems to have been a bit forgotten about (maybe it's had an update now, but i don't think so.), I had the idea of; could Kerbalizer be intergrated into KSP?

For example; you Kerbalizer could be added as a system to customize you current employed Kerbal crews, allowing more personalization to your game. you could change each crew members appearence, change suit colors, add logos, etc.

Anyone else think this could work?
